


<!-- @namespace    sugar.node.stream.actions -->
<!-- @name    SFsOutputStreamAction -->

# ```js SFsOutputStreamAction ```


This class is a stream action that allows you to save file(s) to the filesystem

## Parameters

- **streamObj**  Object: The streamObj object with the properties described bellow:
